name: Clojure Consulting Brasil
body:
###About us ###
We are a group of programmers who specialized in clojure

###What is Clojure?
Checkout out http://www.clojure.org

###Our team
Currently our team of clojure experts are

* @boechat107
* @ebellani
* @vgrocha 

###Our previous projects
We have deployed Clojure solutions in different domains

* Image processing 
* Web crawlers
* Clojure webpages

### Our expertises 
We have experience and worked with the following libraries

* Clojure
* Clojure Contrib
* Compojure
* Hiccup
* Ring

If you are interested in our work, want some more information or just chat about clojure you can join us clojurebrasil -weird-symbol- gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
